product_name: The North Face Chromium Thermal Jacket - Women's
long_description: Ideal for aerobic activities in the winter months, The North Face Chromium Thermal jacket for women features windproof protection and a soft, insulating fleece liner. TNF(TM) Apex ClimateBlock fabric is windproof while remaining breathable; high-loft fleece lining offers all-conditions warmth. The shell has a streamlined silhouette that enhances your freedom of movement. Tall collar, adjustable hem drawcord, stormflap behind the front zipper and internal comfort cuffs all combine to seal in warmth. The North Face Chromium Thermal jacket for women has zippered hand pockets that provide secure storage.
short_description: Ideal for aerobic activities in the winter months, The North Face Chromium Thermal jacket for women features windproof protection and a soft, insulating fleece liner.
